main event: A UFO sighting occurred at Chase Field in Beeville, Texas on 13 December 1957, documented through military ground-visual observation.
interesting points: Two bright red objects, with one trailing the other, were observed moving at very high speeds, comparable to common jet aircraft.
The objects were initially thought to be meteorites due to their appearance and speed, but other conclusions were also considered, including balloons and aircraft.
The objects had exhaust and tails much larger than their actual size, with a speed of approximately 3000 knots.
The observing aircraft was at 35,000 feet, and the objects maintained a similar altitude in the flight path.
The first object passed overhead and then disappeared over the construction of the aircraft, while the second object faded as though blocked from the rear.
sighted object: two bright red objects with one trailing the other
witnesses: military personnel including a Lieutenant and a Jet Instrument Instructor
